text:
Copyright (c) 2016 CBS Studios Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Happy birthday, Remington!

Kelly Clarkson's little boy turned 1 on Wednesday, and the singer couldn't help but celebrate with adorable pics on Instagram.

WATCH: Kelly Clarkson Can't Stop Laughing When Her Voice Cracks In the Studio: 'What the Hell Was That'

The mother of two (and stepmother to husband Brandon Blackstock's two children from a previous relationship) went all out for her family's celebration, dressing Remy in an adorable crown and bowtie.

"Happy 1st Birthday to our sweet little boy!! #RemyB #BlackstockCampgrounds #ILoveHim 😊," Clarkson captioned a collage of photos from the big day.

Happy 1st Birthday to our sweet little boy!! #RemyB #BlackstockCampgrounds #ILoveHim 😊 A post shared by Kelly Clarkson (@kellyclarkson) on Apr 12, 2017 at 8:14pm PDT

WATCH: Kelly Clarkson Shares Cute Family Pic of Her Husband and Their Two Kids: 'They're All Mine'

While Remy definitely appeared to be enjoying his first birthday cake, it was Clarkson's daughter, River Rose, who had her first taste of Nutella last week.

See the 2-year-old's cute reaction to trying the sweet treat in the video below.

Copyright (c) 2016 CBS Studios Inc. All Rights Reserved.
title: Kelly Clarkson Celebrates Son Remington's 1st Birthday -- See the Cute Pics!
